name: Dialog
description: Dialog is a container to display content in an overlay window.

properties.name: appendTo
properties.description: DOM element instance where the overlay panel should be mounted. Valid values are any DOM Element and 'self'. The self value is used to render a component where it is located.

properties.name: ariaCloseIconLabel
properties.description: Defines a string that labels the close icon.

properties.name: baseZIndex
properties.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

properties.name: blockScroll
properties.description: Whether background scroll should be blocked when dialog is visible.

properties.name: breakpoints
properties.description: Object literal to define widths per screen size.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Style class of the component.

properties.name: closable
properties.description: When enabled, the dialog can be closed by clicking the close icon, pressing escape key or clicking the modal background.

properties.name: closeIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the dialog close button.

properties.name: closeOnEscape
properties.description: Specifies if pressing escape key should hide the dialog.

properties.name: content
properties.description: Specifies a custom content for the dialog. For more complex markup, use the "content" slot instead.

properties.name: contentClassName
properties.description: Style class of the content section.

properties.name: contentStyle
properties.description: Style of the content section.

properties.name: dismissableMask
properties.description: Specifies if clicking the modal background should hide the dialog.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Enables dragging to change the position using header.

properties.name: focusOnShow
properties.description: When enabled, first button receives focus on show.

properties.name: footer
properties.description: Footer content of the dialog.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Title content of the dialog.

properties.name: headerClassName
properties.description: Style class of the header section.

properties.name: headerStyle
properties.description: Style of the header section.

properties.name: icons
properties.description: Custom icons template for the header.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.name: keepInViewport
properties.description: Keeps dialog in the viewport.

properties.name: maskClassName
properties.description: Style class of the mask.

properties.name: maskStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the mask.

properties.name: maximizable
properties.description: Whether the dialog can be displayed full screen.

properties.name: maximized
properties.description: When enabled, the dialog is initially displayed full screen.

properties.name: maximizeIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the dialog maximize button when dialog is not maximized.

properties.name: minimizeIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the dialog maximize button when dialog is maximized.

properties.name: minX
properties.description: Minimum value for the left coordinate of dialog in dragging.

properties.name: minY
properties.description: Minimum value for the top coordinate of dialog in dragging.

properties.name: modal
properties.description: Defines if background should be blocked when dialog is displayed.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of the dialog, options are "center", "top", "bottom", "left", "right", "top-left", "top-right", "bottom-left" or "bottom-right".

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: Enables resizing of the content.

properties.name: rtl
properties.description: When enabled dialog is displayed in RTL direction.

properties.name: showCloseIcon
properties.description: When enabled, the close icon is displayed in the header.

properties.name: showHeader
properties.description: Whether to show the header or not.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Inline style of the component.

properties.name: transitionOptions
properties.description: The properties of CSSTransition can be customized, except for "nodeRef" and "in" properties.

properties.name: unstyled
properties.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

callbacks.name: onClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog is clicked.

callbacks.name: onDrag
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dragging dialog.

callbacks.name: onDragEnd
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog dragging is completed.

callbacks.name: onDragStart
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog dragging is initiated.

callbacks.name: onHide
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog is hidden (Required).

callbacks.name: onMaskClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the mask is clicked.

callbacks.name: onMaximize
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when toggle maximize icon is clicked.

callbacks.name: onResize
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke while resizing dialog.

callbacks.name: onResizeEnd
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog resizing is completed.

callbacks.name: onResizeStart
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog resizing is initiated.

callbacks.name: onShow
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when dialog is showed.

methods.name: getCloseButton
methods.description: Used to get close button element.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Used to get the content element of the dialog

methods.name: getElement
methods.description: Used to get the container element of the dialog.

methods.name: getFooter
methods.description: Used to get the dialog's footer element.

methods.name: getHeader
methods.description: Used to get the header element of the dialog
